title: How to Publish a Word Search Coloring Book on Amazon KDP | Step by Step Tutorial (Trending Niche)
description:
In this video, I walk you through how to create a word search coloring book for Amazon KDP. It’s a trending niche, and you’ll see the full publishing process from start to finish. With no shipping or inventory, Amazon takes care of everything so you can focus on creating.
